mapper.select: select a.user_id ,a.platform_id ,a.user_real_name ,a.user_login_name ,a.user_password ,a.phone ,a.mail_address ,a.user_status ,a.remark ,a.create_time ,a.create_date ,a.salt ,coalesce(DATE_FORMAT(a.birthdate,'%Y-%m-%d'),'') as birthdate ,coalesce(a.gender,'') as gender ,b.club_id ,b.user_level as club_user_level from user_info a left join user_detail b on a.user_id = b.user_id where a.is_delete='0' and a.phone=#{phone} and a.platform_id=#{platform}
select a.item_code ,coalesce(b.item_value,'') as item_value from user_profile_item a left join user_profile b on a.item_code = b.item_code and b.user_id = #{userID} and b.is_delete = 0
